title: UDL-Based Science Instructional Design Process for Students with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Pedagogy and Understanding of Learning Disabilities
context.additional_context: Enhancing customized learning environment design capabilities for corporate training managers using VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply at least three multimodal media (VR/simulation) tailored to the cognitive characteristics of students with learning disabilities.
Learners can develop science class assessment tools based on the UDL three principles (Representation, Action & Expression, Engagement, and Assessment).
Learners can implement at least two accessibility solutions based on BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) in large-scale learning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
